TEXT.S: '''Wiy-lin-dun''' amisan nu New Zealandsuotu u Wiy-lin-dun ( kamu nu Hulam: ), itida i New Zealandsaka amisan nu subalan a timulan. (Wellington), . u sakatusa nu New Zealanda tukayan, Sie-Li (, Sydney) atu Mue-E-Pen (, Melbourne) sakalecad u Da-Yang-Cuoa sakay teban nu lalangawan. , katuud ku matinengay tu nalimaan a tademaw itini mueneng atu misakawaw, yadah henay ku nalimaan a kafa atu atu salabi sananay a midangay nu tademaw. , .
